PrecisApproval for the NATIONAL RESEARCH COUNCIL OF CANADA to enter into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the RESEARCH COUNCIL EMPLOYEES' ASSOCIATION covering all employees in the COMPUTER SYSTEMS ADMINISTRATION (CS) GROUP, for a three-year term expiring on December 21, 2007.
